==Trivia==
* ''Usukan'' is a god from the {{w|Maya_mythology|Mayan mythology}}. He's described as a fearsome god who hates humanity and has the earthquake as his servant in his attempt to destroy human life.
** Usukan is part of the "Yantho Triad" alongside his brothers ''Uyitzin'' and ''Yantho''.
** There's another NPC named as one of his brothers: ''[[Yantho]]''.
